"Michela":
"What an amazing battle cry! But I don't
think I could ever produce such a guttural
sound myself."

"Hm? I look like I could? Tsk, are you
looking for a fight, you smart aleck?"

"Still, it would be nice to be able to raise
a roar that travels that far... "

"いい雄叫びだったわ……
でも、あそこまで野太い声を
アタシは出せないわね。"

"ん？　出せそうって？
アンタ、ケンカ売ってるの？"

"しかし、遠くに響く雄叫びのように
声を上げる、というのはいいわね。"
